title: Fix/allow single page web source
body_html:
Related issue #901

While this won't block the error outlined in the referenced issue, it does offer a chance to add a URL to a team's blog that doesn't trigger a synchronisation of all available articles available on that blog site.

It removes the SourcesController to remove some duplication. Only the CUD actions where used but their functionality is covered by the Team model's accepts_nested_attributes.

It displays a conditional help block when the "blog" source type is selected. It is only displayed when the radio button is changed to that value. The JS I wrote for this is probably very, very naive and I'm looking forward to your suggestions to make it better 😄

body:
Related issue #901 

While this won't block the error outlined in the referenced issue, it does offer a chance to add a URL to a team's blog that doesn't trigger a synchronisation of all available articles available on that blog site.

It removes the `SourcesController` to remove some duplication. Only the CUD actions where used but their functionality is covered by the `Team` model's `accepts_nested_attributes`.

It displays a conditional help block when the "blog" source type is selected. It is only displayed when the radio button is _changed to that value_. The JS I wrote for this is probably very, very naive and I'm looking forward to your suggestions to make it better :smile:
